abstract: Nepalese Army attributes cause of United States Marine helicopter crash in May 2015 to bad weather and region's geography.
lead_paragraph: The crash of a United States Marines helicopter in Nepal that killed 13 people in May was caused by bad weather and the geography of the region, the Nepalese Army said.

headline.main: Nepal: Rough Terrain and Bad Weather Led to Helicopter Crash, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Asia; Nepal: Rough Terrain and Bad Weather Led to Helicopter Crash, Report Says
